author: Simon Difford
description: Subtle vermouth and falernum sweetness takes the edge off this after-dinner whiskey charged, sipper of a cocktail.
name: Sherry Herbst
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
